alert.note: Alert for Crosby; Garza (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 6:25PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Garza and southern Crosby Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 624 PM CDT, a line of strong thunderstorms extended from 6 miles northwest of Kalgary to 3 miles southeast of Grassland. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Post, White River Lake, Lake Alan Henry, Kalgary, Caprock and Justiceburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If on or near Lake Alan Henry, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. Move indoors until these storms have passed.
